short_summary: Shared Services Canada is seeking a contractor for servers and hardware maintenance services
description: The infrastructure contains server assets belonging to SSC. Estimated quantity: 18 Large Servers and 16 Extra Large Severs, Specified in RFP documentation.
full_summary:
### Servers with Maintenance and Support
#### Solicitation Number: BPM019380/23567
#### Published Date: August 16, 2023
#### Closing Date: October 6, 2023 (Expired)

**Overview**
Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites you to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Servers and hardware maintenance and support services. The estimated quantity of servers required is 18 Large Servers and 16 Extra Large Server assets belonging to SSC.

**Contract Details**

*   **Duration**: 5 Years
*   **Delivery**: Within 30 Days of contract award
*   **Amendment**: 3

**Attachments**

You can download the RFP documentation from the following links:

https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/34BDB66D-DE41-4D42-B920-1D06238E8927
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/FAD4EA4F-AB4F-48DB-946F-9BB2CA0ACD46
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/7BEC5342-A9FF-4F69-B18C-F0443C801060
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/6D7F57E5-76DD-4624-BDB3-486E2CCCF62E

**Contact Information**

*   **Name**: Stephen Innes
*   **Email**: [stephen.innes@canada.ca](mailto:stephen.innes@canada.ca)
*   **Phone**: (343) 598-3677
*   **Fax**: 999-999-9999
*   **Address**: SSC PVR 180 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1G 4A8, CANADA

**Regional Opportunities**

*   **Region**: Ontario (except NCR)
*   **Countries**: Canada

**Industry Categories**

*   **SOLICITATION CATEGORY CODE**: GD
*   **SOLICITATIONCATEGORY DESCRIPTION**: GD

Please ensure you review the RFP documentation and contact information for more details. Don't hesitate to contact me for any further assistance. I've figured out the solution working as a technical writer. I
